address: JogiLankar near V.B College Rainawari Srinagar J&K, India -190003
about1: Discover Kashmir is an Adventure Travel Planner operating across North India. We organize treks, skiing, snowboarding, climbing, camping and many adventure related expeditions.
about2: During our work we organized countless journeys for our clients. We started as a small tour bureau, and soon we expanded our offers list. Today we have valuable experience travelling and we can advise the most stunning resorts, cities and countries to visit!
